[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [TextElementsRenderer](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.md) &gt; [pickTextElements](./harp-mapview.textelementsrenderer.picktextelements.md)

## TextElementsRenderer.pickTextElements() method

Fill the picking results for the pixel with the given screen coordinate. If multiple \[\[TextElement\]\]s are found, the order of the results is unspecified.

Note: \[\[TextElement\]\]s with identical `featureId` or identical `userData` will only appear once in the list `pickResults`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pickTextElements(screenPosition: THREE.Vector2, pickResults: PickResult[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  screenPosition | THREE.Vector2 | Screen coordinate of picking position. |
|  pickResults | [PickResult](./harp-mapview.pickresult.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Array filled with pick results. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
